abstract: On Friday, JPMorgan Chase filed its registration statement on Form S-4 with the Securities and Exchange Commission related to its acquisition of Bear Stearns. This is the document JPMorgan is using to register the securities it is issuing to the Bear Stearns shareholders and will also function as the proxy statement for the Bear Stearns shareholder vote.
lead_paragraph: On Friday, JPMorgan Chase filed its registration statement on Form S-4 with the Securities and Exchange Commission related to its acquisition of Bear Stearns. This is the document JPMorgan is using to register the securities it is issuing to the Bear Stearns shareholders and will also function as the proxy statement for the Bear Stearns shareholder vote.
